@description.name: @description
@description.body: Basic class for widgets which need a virtual list as popup for example a SelectBox. It's basically supports a drop-down as popup with a virtual list and the whole children management.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: model {qx.data.Array?null} The model data for the widget.
@param.description: The model data for the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Data array containing the data which should be shown in the drop-down.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Delegation object which can have one or more functions defined by the {@link qx.ui.list.core.IListDelegate} interface.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The path to the property which holds the information that should be displayed as a label. This is only needed if objects are stored in the model.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A map containing the options for the label binding. The possible keys can be found in the {@link qx.data.SingleValueBinding} documentation.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The path to the property which holds the information that should be displayed as an icon. This is only needed if objects are stored in the model and icons should be displayed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A map containing the options for the icon binding. The possible keys can be found in the {@link qx.data.SingleValueBinding} documentation.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Default item height.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The maximum height of the drop-down list. Setting this value to null will set cause the list to be auto-sized.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Allow the drop-down to grow wider than its parent.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if a widget is valid. If a widget is invalid, an invalid state will be set.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if a widget is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which will be shown in an tooltip if the widget is invalid.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which will be shown in an invalid tooltip if the {@link #required} is set to true.

@type.name: @type
@type.body: {qx.data.Array} The initial model array of this virtual box.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Trigger a rebuild from the internal data structure.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Shows the drop-down.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Hides the drop-down.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Toggles the drop-down visibility.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This method is called before the drop-down is opened.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This method is called before the drop-down is closed.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the action dependent on the user interaction: e. q. open, or close.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|null} The action or null when interaction doesn't hit any action.
@return.description: The action or null when interaction doesn't hit any action.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper Method to create bind path depended on the passed path.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: source {String} The path to the selection.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: path {String?null} The path to the item's property.
@param.description: The path to the item's property.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Helper method to check if one modifier key is pressed. e.q. Control, Shift, Meta or Alt.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} True when a modifier key is pressed, false otherwise.
@return.description: True when a modifier key is pressed, false otherwise.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for the blur event of the current widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handles the complete keyboard events for user interaction. If there is no defined user interaction {@link #getAction}, the event is delegated to the {@link qx.ui.form.core.VirtualDropDownList#handleKeyboard} method.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handles all pointer events dispatched on the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Updates drop-down minimum size.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds/removes the state 'popupOpen' depending on the visibility of the popup

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the enabled state of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the current set enabled state.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the required state of a widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: required {Boolean} A flag signaling if the widget is required.
@param.description: A flag signaling if the widget is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the current required state of the widget.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} True, if the widget is required.
@return.description: True, if the widget is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the valid state of the widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: valid {Boolean} The valid state of the widget.
@param.description: The valid state of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the valid state of the widget.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} If the state of the widget is valid.
@return.description: If the state of the widget is valid.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the invalid message of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the invalid message of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the invalid message if required of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the invalid message if required of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property valid. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #valid}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property valid. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #valid}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property required. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #required}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property required. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #required}.

@description.body: Resets the user value of the property invalidMessage. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #invalidMessage}.

@description.name: @description

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #requiredInvalidMessage}.
